officialTitle: Improvement in Gross Motor Function and Muscle Tone in Children With Cerebral Palsy Related to Neonatal Icterus: An Open-label, Uncontrolled Clinical Trial
inclusionCriteria:
* Cerebral palsy of any types caused by neonatal icterus
* Must have minimum age of 1 Year
* Must have maximum age of 15 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Epilepsy
* Hydrocephalus with ventricular drain
* Coagulation disorders
* Allergy to anesthetic agents
* Severe health conditions such as cancer, failure of heart, lung, liver or kidney
* Active infections
